data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Tony Pulis (Sheffield Wed) is making a first substitution, with Joe Wildsmith replacing Keiren Westwood.
In the minute 26, Ben Cabango (Swansea) has received a first yellow card.
Adam Reach is on target to give Sheffield Wed a 0-1 advantage.
Great play from Barry Bannan to set up the goal.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
Kasey Palmer is on a sub for Kyle Naughton for Swansea.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Liam Cullen with Andre Ayew.
At Liberty Stadium, Matt Grimes has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Sheffield Wed make their second substitution with Elias Kachunga replacing Jordan Rhodes.
In the minute 57, Swansea's Yan Dhanda has been booked in Swansea.
Goal! Swansea go level at 1-1 through Andre Ayew in Swansea.
Connor Roberts with an assist there.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Jamal Lowe with Wayne Routledge. This is the third substitution made today by Steve Cooper.
Steve Cooper is making the team's fourth substitution at Liberty Stadium with Ryan Manning replacing Jake Bidwell.
Joey Pelupessy is replacing Massimo Luongo for the away team.
In the minute 70, Liam Shaw is replacing Joost van Aken for Sheffield Wed at Liberty Stadium.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Andre Ayew (Swansea) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
